snippet: Rafael Furcal and Casey McGehee, who both missed the entire 2013 major league season, appreciate the opportunities in front of them, albeit on a team made up primarily of youth.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column; Miami Marlins acquisitions Rafael Furcal and Casey McGehee, who both missed the entire 2013 major league season, appreciate the opportunities in freont of them, albeit on a team made up primarily of youth; veterans Furcal and McGehee will play second and third base, respectively.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Furcal and Casey McGehee, who both missed the entire 2013 major league season, appreciate the opportunities in front of them, albeit on a team made up primarily of youth.

headline.main: Shining Examples for Marlins Team Seeking Its Way Back
headline.print_headline: Shining Examples for Team Seeking Its Way Back
